name: REST API Extended
author: TanaponBB

sections.description:
Extends WordPress REST API with ACF Options and GTM Tracking endpoints. Provides GET/POST routes for managing ACF option fields and GTM tracking settings.

Features

  • ACF Options REST API
  • GTM Tracking Integration
  • WooCommerce Tax Settings
  • Coupon Management API
  • Secure Auto-Updates with Signed URLs
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to /wp-content/plugins/acf-rest-api
  2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
  3. Ensure Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) is installed and activated

1.4.0

  • Added secure download system

1.3.4

  • Fixed GTM Options Page not being created
sections.faq:
Does this plugin require ACF?

Yes, Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) must be installed and activated for this plugin to work.

How do auto-updates work?

The plugin checks for updates from a secure server and downloads new versions automatically when available.

upgrade_notice: Version 1.5.1 - Improved security with obfuscated configuration.
